title: Exam: Digital Customer Support & AI Chatbots

questions.question: What is the primary role of an 'AI Chatbot' in fintech?
options: To provide physical cash to customers
To simulate conversation and answer basic queries instantly
To manage the bank's real estate portfolio
questions.explanation: Un chatbot de IA simula una conversación para responder consultas básicas al instante.

questions.question: Where is the adverb of frequency placed in the sentence 'The app is ______ slow'?
questions.explanation: Los adverbios de frecuencia se colocan después del verbo 'to be'.

questions.question: What happens during an 'Escalation'?
options: The issue is moved to a higher level of support or a human agent
The bank increases the interest rate
questions.explanation: Una escalación mueve el problema a un nivel superior de soporte o a un agente humano.

questions.question: Which adverb represents something that happens 10% of the time?
questions.explanation: 'Rarely' (rara vez) se usa para una frecuencia baja, aproximadamente 10%.

questions.question: What is a 'Support Ticket'?
options: A lottery ticket from the bank
A record used to track a customer's request until resolution
A receipt for a cash deposit
A discount voucher for online shopping
questions.explanation: Un 'support ticket' es un registro para rastrear la solicitud de un cliente.

questions.question: Identify the correct sentence structure:
options: I always check my support status.
I check always my support status.
Always I check my support status.
Check I always my support status.
questions.explanation: El adverbio va antes del verbo principal 'check'.

questions.question: What does 'Resolution Time' measure?
options: The time it takes to download the app
The total time taken to solve a customer's problem
The speed of the internet connection
questions.explanation: El 'resolution time' mide el tiempo total para resolver un problema.

questions.question: If a bank 'never' shares security codes, what is the frequency?
questions.explanation: 'Never' significa 0% de frecuencia.

questions.question: What is the 'Help Center' in a fintech app?
options: A physical building in the city center
A self-service portal with FAQ articles
A place to borrow physical books
A social media group for employees
questions.explanation: El 'Help Center' es un portal de autoservicio con artículos de preguntas frecuentes.

questions.question: Which word is a synonym for 'Repayment' in a support context?
questions.explanation: 'Refund' (reembolso) es un sinónimo de devolución o pago de vuelta.

questions.question: When does a customer usually interact with a 'Human Agent'?
options: Only after an escalation from the chatbot
questions.explanation: Los clientes suelen interactuar con un agente humano tras una escalación del chatbot.

questions.question: Complete the sentence: 'Technical issues ______ permanent.'
questions.explanation: Con el verbo 'are', el adverbio va después (are rarely).

questions.question: What does 'SLA' stand for in customer service?
questions.explanation: SLA significa 'Service Level Agreement'.

questions.question: Which channel allows 'real-time' communication via the app?
questions.explanation: El 'Live Chat' permite comunicación en tiempo real.

questions.question: If something happens 'Often', it happens approximately:
questions.explanation: 'Often' (a menudo) representa aproximadamente el 60% de frecuencia.

questions.question: What is the best first step for a common question like 'How to change my PIN'?
options: Call the CEO of the bank
questions.explanation: El primer paso ante dudas comunes es revisar el centro de ayuda o las FAQ.

questions.question: In the sentence 'The bot ______ handles simple tasks', which adverb fits 80% frequency?
questions.explanation: 'Usually' representa un 80% de frecuencia.

questions.question: What should a support agent 'Never' ask for?
options: Your full password or security PIN
questions.explanation: Un agente de soporte nunca debe pedir tu contraseña completa o el PIN de seguridad.

questions.question: What is the purpose of a 'Resolution & Refund'?
options: To solve the problem and return money if necessary
questions.explanation: El propósito es resolver el problema y devolver el dinero si es necesario.

questions.question: Which adverb of frequency fits the 40% mark?
questions.explanation: 'Sometimes' (a veces) representa aproximadamente el 40% de frecuencia.
